title: Mozzarella beef fillet with sautéed potato, onion rings, roasted tomatoes and mushroom sauce
ingredients: 1 tbsp chopped mixed fresh herbs (parsley, chervil, chives)
salt and freshly ground black pepper
100g/3½oz pink fir apple potatoes, halved and blanched for five minutes in boiling water
½ onion, thickly sliced and separated into rings
salt and freshly ground black pepper
